head.title: Combine {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} via {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to add {{FileFormatUp}} document merging capabilities to your {{EnvNameShort}} projects.

header.title: Combine {{FileFormatUp}} files
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can develop advanced {{EnvNameShort}} applications that merge {{FileFormatUp}} documents effortlessly.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful solution for document manipulation. It supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives. Perform operations like merging, splitting, extracting, swapping, and removing pages with ease.

more_features.title: Document merging tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} supports more than 50 popular business file formats, offering a wide range of document manipulation features.

feature_1.title: Merge different document formats
feature_1.content: Combine documents such as PDFs, Word files, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and more. Apply options to specify which pages should be processed.

feature_2.title: Page manipulation
feature_2.content: Easily move, remove, or swap selected pages to structure your business documents as needed.

feature_3.title: Adjust page appearance
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle and change orientation (landscape or portrait) for supported document types.

feature_4.title: Extract pages
feature_4.content: Extract specific pages and save them as a new file or document.

formats.title: Merge various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, allowing you to manipulate business documents with efficiency.

examples.comment_1: Initialize Merger with the input {{FileFormatUp}} document
examples.comment_2: Merge the document with another file
examples.comment_3: Save the merged document to the desired location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides merging capabilities for {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications by merging multiple files into one.
content.step_1: Specify the path to the first {{FileFormatUp}} file.
content.step_4: Merge the files and save the output.

code_1.title: Merge specific pages from files of different formats
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to merge {{FileFormatUp}} files while including specific pages from documents in other formats.
code_1.comment_2: Define options for selecting specific pages
code_1.comment_3: Merge the main document with selected pages from another document
code_1.comment_4: Save the merged file to a new location
